description:
Alpine minimalism: whether on icy north faces, on stormy ascents or during severe snowfall on a summit
– the 3l Ortler jacket and pants are our lightweights for alpinists! The merino naked
Sheep line is concentrated on the essentials: light weight. Protection and comfort. Products
In this line are lightweight and technically sophisticated, yet robust and comfortable. Merino wool is used in specific areas to increase comfort. The dermizax® nx membrane from
Toray – the most high-performance membrane that is used ensures the jacket is breathable,
Windproof and waterproof. The merino naked sheep line is also completely pfc-free in the interests
of sustainability.
name: Ortovox 3L Ortler Pants, Short - Mens
